summary: ever wanted to hunt dragon\'s like the dragonborn in the trailers only to find out the armor in the trailers actually sucked? WELL NOW YOU CAN!
descriptionHtml: ever wanted to hunt dragon\'s like the dragonborn in the trailers only to find out the armor in the trailers actually sucked? WELL NOW YOU CAN! This is a near perfect copy (i couldn\'t find the exact armor he wore) of the marketing dovakiin\'s get up. It has better stat\'s then dadric why well you see... because i can. you can see in the screen shot\'s the effect\'s of the armor. also put the shield and sword in there. Have fun ^_^
author: nazothedark
